name: Legendary Slide - Platinum Edition
description:
In "Legendary Slide - Platinum Edition" you have to clear away the mahjong tiles from the game board by sliding them next to matching ones. Solve unique and mind bending puzzles and collect gems to restore ancient temple of Air. Continue your journey through the Legendary world! This is the Platinum Edition with unique extra content and solution videos for every level.

Features of the Platinum Edition:

* Over 90 Mahjong Puzzles
* Videos with walkthrough solutions for every level
* Customize backgrounds, tile sets and shapes
* Bonus tiles
* Relaxing music
